```pddl
[
  '(:action fold
    ; Fold a resource and update task status
    :parameters (?npc - npc ?loc - location ?input - object ?output - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (inventory ?npc ?input) (foldable ?input ?output))
    :effect (and (inventory ?npc ?output) (not (inventory ?npc ?input))))',

  '(:action cut
    ; Cut an item and update inventory status
    :parameters (?npc - npc ?item - object ?cut_piece - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (inventory ?npc ?item) (measured_to_cut ?item))
    :effect (and (inventory ?npc ?cut_piece) (not (inventory ?npc ?item))))',

  '(:action tape
    ; Tape an item and update the state
    :parameters (?npc - npc ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (inventory ?npc ?item1) (ready_for_taping ?item1))
    :effect (and (inventory ?npc ?item2) (not (inventory ?npc ?item1))))',

  '(:action put
    ; Put an item into a container
    :parameters (?npc - npc ?loc - location ?item - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (inventory ?npc ?item) (at ?container ?loc))
    :effect (and (in ?item ?container) (not (inventory ?npc ?item))))'
]
```
